<SectionUser title="See Also">
<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a3fa829354b3f8b782d40175469540cab">Rewriter::getNextRewritableSource()</a> Here <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-peepholeoptimizer-cpp-/rewriter/#a1ab74e93e550820b697e99a0dc9fdbbd">CopyLike</a> has the following form: dst.dstSubIdx = EXTRACT&#95;SUBREG Src, subIdx. There is <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/regionprinter-cpp/#a5782a8740ff1e91516b41b3726a3168c">only</a> one rewritable source: Src.subIdx, which defines dst.dstSubIdx.
</SectionUser>
